greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A003418(n)/A000793(n).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: g:= proc(n) g(n):= `if`(n=0, 1, ilcm(n, g(n-1))) end:
b:= proc(n, i) option remember; local p;
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = Module[{p}, p = If[i<1, 1, Prime[i]]; If[n==0 || i<1, 1, Max[b[n, i-1], Table[p^j*b[n-p^j, i-1], {j, 1, Log[p, n] // Floor }]]]]; a[0]=1; a[n_] := LCM @@ Range[n] / b[n, If[n<8, 3, PrimePi[ Ceiling[ 1.328*Sqrt[n*Log[n] // Floor]]]]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 40}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 27 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 10 2013
